answerText: Cole Albert Porter[10] "Tom, Dick or Harry" comes from this musical by Porter which is about a production of The Taming of the Shrew. Fred Graham plays Petruchio, and Lilli Vanessi plays the title female who sings "I Hate Men."
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 13 - Finals 1 | 9 | Trash | None | College
subject: Trash
question: Question: This composer wrote the musical Paris, which included the song "Let's Do It, Let's Fall in Love," a song that was recently used for the Woody Allen film Midnight in Paris. For 10 points each: [10] Name this composer of musicals like DuBarry Was a Lady and Anything Goes, as well as the song "Tom, Dick or Harry."
